thread.title: Revzi Plans for Rapid National Expansion and Names Fooda Co-Founder Shane Jones as Director of Strategic Partnerships

author: cnbc.com
title: Revzi Plans for Rapid National Expansion and Names Fooda Co-Founder Shane Jones as Director of Strategic Partnerships

organizations.name: revzi plans for rapid national expansion

text:
CHICAGO, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Revzi today announced that Shane Jones, Co-founder and former Director of Partnerships and Business Development for leading food delivery company, Fooda, has joined Revzi's Chicago team. In his new role, Jones will lead the company's efforts in building strategic partnerships with local businesses and associations in restaurants, retail, service, and healthcare industries.
Jones has over seven years of experience in the restaurant business and as one of Fooda's original co-founders, played a huge part in the company's early startup stages to national expansion. Now as the new Director of Strategic Partnerships for Revzi's Chicago headquarters, Jones will develop and foster relationships with business owners in local markets. His wealth of experience will be crucial at Revzi, which is currently undergoing rapid expansion and growth in not just Chicago, but nationally.
"I am excited to introduce my network to Revzi's products. It's an essential tool for restaurants or merchants to stay competitive, increase sales, and grow their business," said Jones. "A lot of my energy and passion will be dedicated to this team â€“ the future of Revzi is bright and what the company is going through right now is very special. I'm joining at the perfect stage, when Revzi is making huge traction [in the industry] as a startup."
The hiring of Jones is just the beginning of Revzi's rapid national expansion and growth as a startup company. In the past six months, the company's second office opened in Denver, CO; and in 2018 alone, the company opened its Newport Beach, CA office, released a new website, and along with the hiring of Jones, created new positions in finance, marketing, and strategic partnerships.
"We're seeing the success stories of our clients and employees unfold," said Paul Hadfield, Managing Partner of Revzi. "We've watched businesses expand to new locations with our payments acceptance process and customer analytics software, and we've also had employees transfer out of state to hire teams and open new offices. The best part is just getting started."
Revzi's industry-leading products and services are ideal for local businesses, including bars, restaurants, retail, healthcare, and service-based small businesses. For more information, visit www.revzi.com or contact (833) 467-3894. Anyone interested in joining the Revzi team in Chicago, Denver, or Newport Beach can email info@revzi.com .
About Revzi
Founded in 2014, Revzi is one of the industry's fastest growing point-of-sale technology and analytics software companies that provides local businesses with the industry's leading payment processing software, tools, and customer insights to make them successful. Revzi adds value to the payment processing experience by listening to the challenges of each individual business, and making recommendations on the industry's best software solution to help local businesses turn payments into profits. With locations in Chicago, Denver, and Orange County, Revzi supports more than 1,500 bars, restaurants, retail, healthcare, service, and other local small businesses to make better informed decisions on $1.5 billion dollars in annual sales.
Business owners interested in the industry's leading payment processing technology should contact Revzi at (833) 467-3894 or visit www.revzi.com .
